Detailed Description

Julia Set Renderer This class takes a range over which to generate an image, and then generates a julia set to fill that region.

Parameters:
x0  The lower left x value of the range to show
y0  The lower left y value of the range to show
x1  The upper right x value of the range to show
y1  The upper right x value of the range to show
